com.novartis.opensource.yada.adaptor.YADAAdaptorException

    com.novartis.opensource.yada

    • Uses of YADAAdaptorException in com.novartis.opensource.yada

      Methods in com.novartis.opensource.yada that throw YADAAdaptorException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private String Service._execute()
      Internal request processor for "get" or "update" requests (i.e., non-uploads.)
      private void QueryManager.prepQueriesForExecution() 
      private void QueryManager.processQueries()
      A broker method which calls QueryManager.endowQuery(String) (for standard param requests) or QueryManager.endowQueries(JSONParams) for json params requests, followed by QueryManager.prepQueriesForExecution() in succession
      Constructors in com.novartis.opensource.yada that throw YADAAdaptorException 
      Constructor and Description
      QueryManager(YADARequest yadaReq)
      Constructor stores config object and JSONParams if necessary, then calls effectively bootstraps query management process by calling QueryManager.processQueries()

      Create a YADA SELECT statement from core wrapping it in two subqueries to account for pagination, sorting, and filtering with a where clause.

      Create a YADA SELECT statement from core wrapping it in two subqueries to account for pagination, sorting, and filtering with a where clause.
      StringBuffer SQLServerAdaptor.buildSelectCount(String core, org.json.JSONObject filters)
      Uses SQLServer ROW_NUMBER() OVER syntax for viewLimit
      StringBuffer OracleAdaptor.buildSelectCount(String core, org.json.JSONObject filters)
      Returns a StringBuffer with core sql + filters, wrapped in an outer sql COUNT(*) query.
      StringBuffer JDBCAdaptor.buildSelectCount(String core, org.json.JSONObject filters)
      Returns a StringBuffer with core sql + filters, wrapped in an outer sql COUNT(*) query.
      protected String JDBCAdaptor.getQueryFilters(boolean append)
      Calls JDBCAdaptor.getQueryFilters(boolean, StringBuffer, JSONObject) with append = false as well as a null StringBuffer and filters from Adaptor.yadaReq
      protected String JDBCAdaptor.getQueryFilters(boolean append, StringBuffer sql, org.json.JSONObject filters)
      Converts the filters stored in the local Adaptor.yadaReq config as json into an SQL fragment for appendage to a WHERE clause
